comments.text:
When closing the edit contact popup with the Escape key, it also closes the search filter.


Reproduce steps:
 1. Search for emails
 2. In the filtered list, click on one email
 3. In the email view, rightclick on the (From) contact, and click "Edit contact"
 4. A small popup turns up.
 5. Press escape to close it

Expected:
 The popup closes.

Seen:
 The popup closes. The search is reset/aborted.

Fix:
 Stop the Escape key event after closing the popup, don't let it be processed a second time.
comments.author: buchner.johannes@gmx.at
comments.creator: buchner.johannes@gmx.at
